terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content:
Here are the Terms and Conditions for AI RateMyProfessor, an AI-powered professor rating and recommendation platform:

 AI RateMyProfessor - Terms and Conditions

1. Acceptance of Terms
By accessing or using AI RateMyProfessor, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

2. User Account
You must create an account to use AI RateMyProfessor. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.

3. Content Ownership
You retain ownership of the reviews and ratings you submit to AI RateMyProfessor. However, by posting content, you grant AI RateMyProfessor a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, display, and analyze your content on the platform.

4. Acceptable Use
You agree not to use AI RateMyProfessor for any unlawful purpose or to post content that is illegal, offensive, defamatory, or infringes on others' rights.

5. Review Guidelines
All reviews must be based on personal experiences and should be honest, constructive, and respectful. Do not post false or misleading information about professors or courses.

6. AI-Generated Content
AI RateMyProfessor uses artificial intelligence to generate recommendations and insights. While we strive for accuracy, AI-generated content should be considered supplementary to user-generated reviews and ratings.

7. Privacy
Your use of AI RateMyProfessor is governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review it to understand how we collect, use, and protect your data.

8. Termination
We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at our discretion, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties.

9. Changes to Service
We reserve the right to modify or discontinue AI RateMyProfessor at any time, with or without notice.

10. Limitation of Liability
AI RateMyProfessor is provided "as is" without any warranties. We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of the service or the accuracy of the information provided.

11. Educational Decisions
While AI RateMyProfessor aims to provide helpful information, you are solely responsible for your educational decisions. Our platform should not be the only factor in choosing courses or professors.

12. Governing Law
These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of California, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

13. Changes to Terms
We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page.

14. Contact Us
If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at i@enk.icu.

By using AI RateMyProfessor, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these Terms and agree to be bound by them.

Last updated: Aug 25, 2025

Note: This is a basic template and should be reviewed and customized by a legal professional to ensure it meets all necessary legal requirements for your specific platform and jurisdiction.
